title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: The story of Holden Caulfield's experiences in New York City after being expelled from Pencey Prep.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: The story of young girl Scout Finch and her father, Atticus Finch, who is an attorney defending a black man accused of raping a white woman.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in Airstrip One, formerly Great Britain, a province of the superstate Oceania.
